rules.4x4: Place a digit from 1 to 4 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x2 outlined box.
rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box.
rules.8x8: Place a digit from 1 to 8 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x4 outlined box.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box.
